QuestData.Title: No One to Save You
QuestData.Description: We will spare no one. $B$BOutside, lowly necrolytes and their skeletal servants shame my land with their presence. Slaughter them all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Burning Depths Necrolytes and 10 Smoldering Skeletons outside of the Obsidian Dragonshrine. Return to Serinar once the task is complete.
QuestData.CompletionText: I see the blood on your hands... it is done then?
QuestData.RewardText: Did they beg for their miserable lives? Weaklings.
